participant_2.name: Emily

participant_2.background: I am deathly afraid of heights. I am a party animal. My favorite movie is mean girls. I own a cat and a dog.

content.text: Hi, I'm a 46 year old single dad. I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year.
Hi, I'm 22 years old. I'm a party animal and my favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog. I'm afraid of heights.

Wow, you're quite the character! I'm a pretty laid-back guy. I like to stay in and play video games or watch movies. I'm not much of a party animal, but I do like to go out and have fun with my friends.
That's cool! I like to go out and have fun too, but I'm not a big fan of video games. I'd rather be outside doing something active.
I can understand that. I love being outside too. I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming.
Me too! I love swimming! I also like to go camping and fishing.
I've never been camping or fishing, but they sound like fun. I'd be up for trying them sometime.
Cool! We should go camping sometime. I have a friend with a cabin in the mountains.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to go camping with you.
Great! We'll have to make plans soon.
